body.p: The Board considered whether the allocation of an impairment loss for a disposal group should be consistent with the requirements of IAS 36 or with the requirements of SFAS 144. The Board concluded that it would be simplest to require the same allocation as is required by IAS 36 for cash‑generating units. Although this is different from SFAS 144, the disposal group as a whole will be measured at the same amount.
